Welcome to City Scanner API’s documentation!¶

City Scanner API provides programmatic access to City Scanner data via HTTP GET requests.

GET /raw_data_api/collections/¶

Gets a list of all available collections.

Return

List of collections

Rtype

JSON

GET /raw_data_api/summary/¶

Gets a summary of MongoDB collections.

Return

Summary of data

Rtype

JSON

GET /raw_data_api/latest/¶

Gets latest data from MongoDB.

Parameters

  • collection (str, required) – Collection to retrieve from

  • limit (int, optional) – Number of entries to retrieve

  • start (str, optional) – Start date in format YYYY-MM-DDT20HH:MM:SS

  • end (str, optional) – End date in format YYYY-MM-DDT20HH:MM:SS

Return

List of data

Rtype

JSON
